repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends wget -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/influxdb/influxdb_latest_amd64.deb
RUN dpkg -i influxdb_latest_amd64.deb
RUN rm -r /opt/influxdb/shared

VOLUME /opt/influxdb/shared

CMD /usr/bin/influxdb --pidfile /var/run/influxdb.pid -config /opt/influxdb/shared/config.toml

EXPOSE 8083
EXPOSE 8086
EXPOSE 8090
EXPOSE 8099
